params.batchId: The batch ID to filter by.
params.limit: The maximum number of token IDs to return.

params.status: The battery status to filter by.

queryCarbonFootprint(uint256,bytes32,byt.details: Not declared `view` because it logs a DID action (state change).

params.didHash: The DID hash used for role validation.
The DID hash used for role validation.
The DID hash used for role validation.
The DID hash used for role validation.
The DID hash used for role validation.

exists(uint256).notice: Checks whether a battery passport exists.

getPassportsByBatchPaginated(uint256,uin.notice: Returns token IDs for a given batch with pagination.

getPassportsByStatus(uint8).notice: Returns an array of token IDs that have the specified battery status.

hashTypedDataV4(bytes32).notice: Computes and returns the EIP-712 digest for a given struct hash.

queryCarbonFootprint(uint256,bytes32,byt.notice: Returns the carbon footprint hash for a given token.

queryDueDiligence(uint256,bytes32,bytes).notice: Returns the due diligence hash for a given token.

queryGeneralProductInfo(uint256,bytes32,.notice: Returns the general product information hash for a given token.

queryMaterialComposition(uint256,bytes32.notice: Returns the material composition hash for a given token.

queryPublicProductInfo(uint256,bytes32).notice: Returns the unique identifier (public product information) for a given token.

viewBatteryPassport(uint256).notice: Returns the full BatteryPassport struct for a given token ID.
